Ok just checking in. I haven't really been keeping up due to summer but right now my projector's lamp needs replacing so no PS3 until thats fixed

Haven't really made anything new but I converted an obsolete carrier into a useful battle cruiser.

EDIT: See page 111

Haven't really made anything new but I converted an obsolete carrier into a useful battle cruiser.

That I did see

She (Fearless) is now useful in combat, in her carrier state she couldn't fit large fighters in her hanger, let alone there ammo and pilots, turning her into a battle cruiser meant she could be used effectively in battle.

She (Fearless) is now useful in combat, in her carrier state she couldn't fit large fighters in her hanger, let alone there ammo and pilots, turning her into a battle cruiser meant she could be used effectively in battle.

carriers are not meant to carry big fighters. The rules are 10 tons at most anyway

I know but her hanger was tiny, I had trouble getting anything inside the ship, and besides she had heavy armour all over so she couldn't be used as a carrier anyway, that and that the Majestic had a usable hanger and fits with every rule.
